summary.para: Explicit pipelining where each device works on a different stage of pipeline, concurrently, after each push()
To be able to push at each iteration, double-buffering is used for inputs
1 push (1 thread) = (switch buffer):false
1 more push (1 thread) = (switch buffer)(read+compute+write)[stage-0]:false
1 more push (2 threads)= (switch buffer)(read+compute+write)[stage-0] ++ (switch buffer):false
1 more push (2 threads)= (switch buffer)(read+compute+write)[stage-0] ++ (switch buffer)(read+compute+write)[stage-1]:true

enqueued with global size = local size so it costs minimal latency to alter a few variables between repeats
when not "", disables host-to-device pipelining(which is enabled with compute() parameters)
usaes same parameters with main kernel execution

does optionally pipelined kernel execution load balancing between multiple devices

something like: @"multi-line C# string that has multiple kernel definitions"
AcceleratorType.CPU uses number of threads for an N-core CPU(between 1 and N-1)(-1 means N-1)
AcceleratorType.GPU uses number of GPUs equal to this parameter. Between 1 and N(-1 means N)
devices that share RAM with CPU will not do extra copies. Devices that don't share RAM will directly access RAM and reduce number of copies
disables extra command queue allocation, can't enable driver-driven pipelining later. Useful for device to device pipelining with many stages.

member.summary: her alma admnda nceki admdaki aygt performanslarna gre aygtlarn yeni yklerini belirler. Sonradan yeni aygt eklenebilir
member.param: dengelenecek ykn tamam

her aygt iin ayr olarak, dengeleme iin eklenebilecek veya kartlabilecek en kk yk miktar Bu deer, aygttaki(bilgisayardaki) ekran kart + ilemci saysnn, opencl-local-thread saylar ve pipeline para saylar ile arpmlarnn toplamlarna eittir Bir bilgisayarda 3 ekran kart varsa ve her biri 256 local thread saysna sahipse o bilgisayarn en kk yk adm 768 thread olur. Pipeline optimizasyonu kullanlmsa ve pipeline adm says 16 ise, en kk yk adm 768 * 16 yani 12288 thread olur. Bu ekilde tm bilgisayarlarn mutlaka toplam thread says kadar thread paylaabilmeleri zorunludur En kk admlar 512 olan iki bilgisayara toplam 1280 thread paylatrlamaz. Veya 256 fazladan thread kullanlr ama kernel iinde bunlar kullanlmaz(verimsiz de olsa alm olur)
